column8:
Withnail & I - Her Hare Here
I came to this film long after its release.  It is hard to find when the two main actors, Grant and McGann and for that matter Ralph Brown, have done anything better. While Bruce Robinson would follow this script with 'How to get ahead in advertising'.
Withnail & I was a confluence of some of the best writing and acting of its time. It's lasting appeal being testament to that.
